content.rendered:
Home

SMSF STORAGE IN Manhattan

We understand the importance of trusting your SMSF gold storage. That’s why we offer state-of-the-art safe deposit boxes designed to provide unparalleled peace of mind.

Book a Tour

Why Choose At Integrated Vaults for Your SMSF Investment Storage Manhattan Needs?

At Integrated Vaults prioritises both security and ease of access. Our convenient location allows you to visit and manage your SMSF investment storage at your own discretion.
SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOXES FOR SMSF

Managing a self-managed superannuation fund (SMSF) involves ensuring your assets are stored securely and compliantly. At Integrated Vaults offers a reliable and secure solution for storing bullions within your SMSF portfolio.

  • Industry-leading security measures: Our facilities utilise advanced security measures to safeguard your collection. These include 24/7 surveillance and multi-factor access control, adhering to the strictest SMSF storage regulations.
  • Privacy you can trust: Your safe deposit box is your vault. You retain complete control over access, guaranteeing the utmost privacy for your valuable coins and banknotes.
  • Tailored safe deposit boxes: We offer a variety of safe deposit box sizes to perfectly accommodate your collection, whether you have a few cherished pieces or a comprehensive investment portfolio.

SECURED ACCESS At Integrated Vaults

At Integrated Vaults, we understand that the security of your SMSF assets is paramount. That’s why we prioritise the absolute safety of your valuables with a multi-layered approach to security.

  • Multi-factor access control: Accessing your safe deposit box requires more than just a key. Our advanced access control system utilises a combination of methods, including unique user codes and biometric verification, to guarantee that only authorised individuals can enter the vault.
  • Rigorous staff training: Our highly trained staff adheres to strict security protocols. Regular background checks and ongoing security training ensure only trustworthy personnel can access the vault and your safe deposit box.
  • 24/7 alarm monitoring: A professional security service monitors our advanced alarm systems around the clock. Any sign of intrusion triggers an immediate response, ensuring the safety of your valuables.
SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

WHY CHOOSE At Integrated Vaults?

SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

 

Our professional staff is dedicated to providing you with exceptional service and support.

NO ACCESS FEES

Pay only for your safety deposit box size.

NO HIDDEN FEES

We offer complete transparency in our pricing.

STATE-OF-THE-ART SECURITY TECHNOLOGY

 

We utilise the latest security advancements to protect your valuables.

FLEXIBLE ACCESS OPTIONS

 

Choose the access plan that best suits your needs through convenient scheduling.

PRIVATE VIEWING ROOMS

 

Discreetly review your belongings in a dedicated, secure space.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

  1. Find At Integrated Vaults: Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible.
  2. Select a storage size: We have four box sizes available, so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.
  3. Automate your payments: We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

OTHER SOLUTIONS OFFERED

At Integrated Vaults cater to a wide range of valuables

Jewellery

 

Keeping your precious jewellery safe in United States is a constant concern. Imagine the peace of mind of knowing your cherished heirlooms and sparkling gems are protected from burglary, fire, and unforeseen events.

Gold Bullion

 

Your valuables deserve the utmost security. At Integrated Vaults, we understand the importance of protecting your precious metals and other assets. That’s why we offer a range of secure deposit box solutions to provide unparalleled peace of mind.

Important Documents

 

Irreplaceable documents like wills, passports, birth certificates, and property deeds hold immense importance. At Integrated Vaults provides a safe and reliable solution for storing these critical documents.

Currency

 

Cash or foreign currency can be a security risk when kept at home or in a traditional safe. At Integrated Vaults offers a secure and discreet solution for storing your currency. Our access-controlled vaults ensure that only authorised individuals can access your valuables.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What security features ensure the safety of my Self-Managed Superannuation Fund (SMSF) storage At Integrated Vaults?

At Integrated Vaults ensures the safety of your SMSF gold & silver bullion storage with a combination of advanced security measures. These include 24/7 video surveillance, multi-step verification to ensure only authorised individuals can enter, and state-of-the-art alarm systems providing additional protection. The facility is made to meet the highest security standards to safeguard your valuable assets.

Can I access my SMSF storage anytime, or are there specific visiting hours?

You can access your SMSF gold bullion during business hours set by At Integrated Vaults. While the facility is highly secure, At Integrated Vaults maintains scheduled access hours to ensure security and operational efficiency. You should check with their customer service team for the most current visiting hours and any requirements for arranging visits.

What insurance options are available for SMSF investment storage At Integrated Vaults?

At Integrated Vaults offers a third- party comprehensive insurance option for SMSF investment storage, providing coverage against theft, damage, and loss. This insurance is designed to give you peace of mind, knowing that your investments are protected against various risks. The coverage details can be tailored to meet your needs, ensuring your SMSF storage is fully safeguarded.

How can I start using the SMSF storage service At Integrated Vaults?

To start using the SMSF storage service At Integrated Vaults, you need to contact their customer service team. The process involves completing the necessary registration and documentation, which may include providing identification and information about your SMSF. Once registered, you will be guided through the process of securely storing your gold bullion at their facility.

Are there any restrictions on the types of gold bullion or investments that can be stored in At Integrated Vaults' SMSF storage?

There are no specific restrictions on the types of gold bullion or investments that can be stored in At Integrated Vaults’ SMSF storage. This flexibility allows you to store gold products, including bars and coins of various weights. At Integrated Vaults is equipped to handle different forms of bullion, ensuring that your investment needs are accommodated.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

01. Find At Integrated Vaults

Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible

Find now

02. Select a storage size

We have four box sizes available so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.

View Storage Sizes

03. Automate your payments

We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

Start Now

CONTACT US TODAY!

Ready to secure your peace of mind? Contact At Integrated Vaults today to learn more about our secure valuables or gold bullion storage solutions or to schedule a visit to our facility.

Phone:

(646) 338 4170
(9am – 5pm AEST)

 

Fax:

(03) 9654 8167

 

Mailing Address:

800 Third Avenue
Midtown Manhattan, New York 10022

 

Email Us:

info@integratedvaults.com

 

OUR VAULT LOCATION

Level 10, 227 Collins Street (Wales Corner Building)
Manhattan, Victoria
United States
